# seqera_teams (Data Source)

Teams DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "seqera_teams" "my_teams" {
  org_id  = 1
  team_id = 10
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `org_id` (Number) Organization numeric identifier
- `team_id` (Number) Team numeric identifier

### Read-Only

- `avatar_url` (String)
- `description` (String)
- `members_count` (Number)
- `name` (String)
